org.extremecomponents.util
Class HtmlBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.extremecomponents.util.HtmlBuilder
Direct Known Subclasses:
HtmlView
public class HtmlBuilder
extends Object

Will build up an Html String piece by piece. Note: unless otherwise noted if the parameter used for any of the methods is null or empty then that html element will not be appended. The advantage of this is you do not have to do any null or empty string checking to use this class.

Author:
Jeff Johnston

Constructor Summary

          Default constructor using a StringWriter, which is really just a StringBuffer.
